data.title: Paper Series: 25th IVR World Congress
data.meta_description:
14524791 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This summary provides the key details from the document in 3 sentences:

This paper discusses a study by Eduardo C. B. Bittar on the philosophy of history and critical theory of Albrecht Wellmer and Axel Honneth. It analyzes concepts like democracy, modern reason, and social utopias in the context of examining the consequences of the perceived "death of history" and stagnation of critical thought in modern society. The document examines debates around the end of history and intellectual conditions in an information society.
